meanings.definition: A period of 24 hours, especially as a unit of time.
meanings.sent1: In just a few days, we will celebrate your birthday.
meanings.sent2: The sun rises and sets every day.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe how quickly the days fly by!
meanings.sent4: The days are like puzzle pieces, fitting together to form a week.
meanings.sent5: The days march on, never looking back.

meanings.definition: A particular period of time in history or in a person's life.
meanings.sent1: During his college days, he made many lifelong friends.
meanings.sent2: The days of the ancient Egyptians were filled with mystery.
meanings.sent3: Her days as a pirate were short-lived but exciting.
meanings.sent4: The days of childhood are filled with wonder and discovery.
meanings.sent5: In the days of knights and dragons, bravery was essential.

meanings.definition: A specified time or period in the future.
meanings.sent1: In a few days, we will know the results of the competition.
meanings.sent2: The days ahead are full of promise and opportunity.
meanings.sent3: His days as a famous actor are just around the corner.
meanings.sent4: The days to come hold the key to our success.
meanings.sent5: The days ahead stretch out like an open road waiting to be traveled.
